#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
const int M = 1e9 + 7;

void mul(LL a[5][5], LL b[5][5]) {
  static LL c[5][5];
  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 5; ++j) {
      c[i][j] = 0;
      for (int k = 0; k < 5; ++k) {
        c[i][j] += a[i][k] * b[k][j];
      }
    }
  }
  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 5; ++j) {
      a[i][j] = c[i][j] % M;
    }
  }
}

int main() {
  int n, k, m;
  cin >> n >> k >> m;
  LL A[5][5], R[5];
  memset(A, 0, sizeof(A));
  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) R[i] = 1;
  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j) A[i][j] = 2;
    A[i][i] = 1;
  }
  for (n--; n; n >>= 1) {
    if (n & 1) {
      LL tmp[5];
      for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
        tmp[i] = 0;
        for (int j = 0; j < 5; ++j) {
          tmp[i] += A[i][j] * R[j];
        }
      }
      for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) R[i] = tmp[i] % M;
    }
    mul(A, A);
  }
  cout << R[k - 1] * m % M << endl;
  return 0;
}
